cufy.text.json

Class JSON.Syntax

  • java.lang.Object
    • cufy.text.json.JSON.Syntax
  • Enclosing class:
    JSON

    public static class JSON.Syntax
extends java.lang.Object
    A structure holding the symbols of a JSON formatter.
